      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="nl">Napoleon's life in painting</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This presentation illustrates Napoleon's life by a collection of paintings. The texts are written in Czech, nevertheless the names are clear. A teacher can provide his own comments in his language.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bonaparte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">paintings</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">France</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">battle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Elba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">emperor</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Darstellung veranschaulicht das Leben Napoleons durch 
eine Ansammlung Anstriche. Die Texte werden auf Tschechen geschrieben,
dennoch sind die Namen klar. Ein Lehrer kann seinen eigenen Kommentar 
in seiner Sprache zur Verfügung stellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette présentation illustre la vie de Napoleon par une 
collection de peintures. Les textes sont écrits dans le Tchèque, 
néanmoins les noms sont clairs. Un professeur peut fournir ses 
propres commentaires en son langage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta apresentação ilustra a vida de Napoleon por uma 
coleção das pinturas. Os textos são escritos no czech, não 
obstante os nomes estão desobstruídos. Um professor pode fornecer 
seus próprios comentários em sua língua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa presentazione illustra la vita del Napoleon da una 
collezione di pitture. I testi sono scritti nel Ceco, tuttavia i nomi 
sono chiari. Un insegnante può fornire le sue proprie osservazioni in
suo linguaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η παρουσίαση επεξηγεί τη ζωή Napoleon από μια συλλογή 
των έργων ζωγραφικής. Τα κείμενα γράφονται στα τσέχικα, 
εντούτοις τα ονόματα είναι σαφή. Ένας δάσκαλος μπορεί να 
παρέχει τα σχόλιά του στη γλώσσα του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta presentación ilustra la vida de Napoleon por una 
colección de pinturas. Los textos se escriben en checo, sin embargo 
los nombres están claros. Un profesor puede proporcionar a sus 
propios comentarios en su lenguaje.</string>
          </description>
